featureType.name: wq_plus
featureType.title: wq_testing
featureType.bypassSQL: SELECT station_no, station_name as sitename,anzlic_no, project_no, sample_collection_date || determinand_code as id, sample_collection_date, determinand_description, results_value, longitude as x, -latitude as y FROM wq_ir_results WHERE 1=1
